original_text: that when you hear the sound of the horn, pipe, lyre, trigon, harp, bagpipe, and every kind of music, you are to fall down and worship the golden image that King Nebuchadnezzar has set up.
korean_text: 너희는 나팔과 피리와 수금과 삼현금과 양금과 생황과 및 모든 악기 소리를 들을 때에 엎드리어 느부갓네살 왕이 세운 금 신상에게 절하라

sentences.original_text: that when you hear the sound of the horn,
the pipe, the lyre, the trigon, the harp, and the bagpipe,
sentences.korean_translation: 피리와 수금과 삼각금과 하프와 백파이프 소리가 나고,

sentences.original_text: that King Nebuchadnezzar has set up.
